name: TNN Motor Sports Hardcore 4x4
summary:
Get bent over six radical terrains. 
White knuckle driving and extreme weather conditions. 
Rampage your rig with actual four wheel independent suspension and real vehicle motion. 
Gut wrenching multiple views with hard-rocking adrenaline-pumping music. 
Maxx out your truck, crunch the fenders, and kiss your competition, but don't drive it into the ground.
